attribute.name: referencesTemporaryIndividual
attribute.description: Flag that indicates whether the inmigration references a temporary individual. A temporary individual is an individual who was once registered in the HDS but does not know their permanent id. In this situation, a temporary id (and individual) is created which should be reconciled later.
